item.title: Stone Sour - Get Inside
item.description:
Seed gotta
let it grow
Why ya gotta watch
when I let it feed
Better look
into the mirror
For the face you
hide away everyday
But I don’t give a
fuxx I let it roll
I smoke
the old
Gotta run
gotta rend
Gotta maim
gotta make it
Through
another maze
Stay
away
Please wring the
blood from my hands
Don’t pretend that
you understand me
I don’t even want you
looking at me
Motherfuxxer
get inside
Get inside get inside
(motherfuxxer)
Get inside get inside
(motherfuxxer)
Get inside get inside
(motherfuxxer)
Get inside
get inside

Christ have you
seen this guy
Make ya
sick gonna
Peel away
all the impurities
Cuz all you
wanna do is
Keep curin’ me but I
don’t give a fuxx
I kill
everyone
You’ll be mopping up
blood and guts and
All the shit
when I’m done
Isn’t this fun
gimme a gun and
I’ll tell you all the
secrets I hide
Before
I run
Please wring the
blood from my hands
Don’t pretend that
you understand me
I don’t even want you
looking at me
Motherfuxxer
get inside
Get inside get inside
(motherfuxxer)
Get inside get inside
(motherfuxxer)
Get inside get inside
(motherfuxxer)
Get inside
get inside

Maybe if you
look away
I can slip away
gotta get away
(Run
motherfuxxer)
Right now
I stare at shit
I’m a heretic but I’ll
never give you
None
of it
Tied up
in the back
Of the lab laid on the
slab got the
Gift of gab what’choo
want from me
I don’t even know
I got a damn
Disease but I know
you wanna kill me
Please wring the
blood from my hands
Don’t pretend that
you understand me
I don’t even want you
looking at me
Motherfuxxer
